wikipedia_page.main: Derek Edward Scott (born 8 February 1958) is an English former professional footballer who made more than 400 appearances in the Football League playing as a right-sided full-back for Burnley and Bolton Wanderers.

response: During his first spell as manager at Burnley his son Dave played for Burnley and his daughter married club captain Derek Scott. Their sons, Chris and Paul, also pulled on the Claret shirt.
* Derek Scott (athlete) (born 1985), American distance runner and coach
* Derek Scott (footballer) (born 1958), English former professional footballer
* Derek Scott (music director) (1921–2006), English musical director and composer
* Derek Scott Jr., American stock car racing driver
